data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 7,010 believers living in Kalasin, Thailand.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kalasin, Thailand
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Kalasin, Thailand.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 7,010 believers in Kalasin to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Kalasin, Thailand to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bisu people.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,069,934, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Kalasin who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Kalasin, Thailand has a population of 1,084,100.

We estimate Kalasin has 7,010 people who might know Jesus, 7,156 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,069,934 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,077,090 lost in Kalasin that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
